message: Let's be fair and avoid inflation eating our money. I propose a 60/40 split.
Your offer was tempting, but let's be real - I'm losing more to inflation.  I propose a slightly better split for me, keeping it close to your original idea.
Bob, I understand your position on inflation, but your last offer wasn't fair considering the initial split I proposed. This offer is a compromise to account for the decreasing value.
